bridge.toolkit.commands
Class PreProcess

java.lang.Object
  bridge.toolkit.commands.PreProcess
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.commons.chain.Command
public class PreProcess
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.commons.chain.Command

The first module in the toolkit that transforms the SCPM into a imsmanifest.xml file and generates a urn_resource_map.xml file from the resource package.

Field Summary
private static java.lang.String CONVERSION_FAILED
          Message that is returned if the conversion from SCPM to imsmanifest.xml file is unsuccessful.
private static DMParser dmParser
          Provides a way to parse S1000D files and to find data model codes.
private static org.jdom.Document manifest
          JDOM Document that is used to create the imsmanifest.xml file.
private static java.lang.String src_dir
          String that represents the location of the resource package.
private static java.io.InputStream transform
          InputStream for the xsl file that is used to transform the SCPM file to an imsmanifest.xml file.
private static java.lang.String TRANSFORM_FILE
          Location of the XSLT transform file.
private static org.jdom.Document urn_map
          JDOM Document that is used to create the urn_resource_map.xml file.

Performs the transformation of the S1000D file to the imsmanifest.xml.

addResources

private static void addResources(org.jdom.Document urn_map)
                          throws ResourceMapException,
                                 org.jdom.JDOMException,
                                 java.io.IOException
Adds 'resource' elements to the imsmanifest.xml file for every file found in the resource package that is provided.

Parameters:
urn_map - JDOM Document that is used to create the urn_resource_map.xml file.
Throws:
ResourceMapException - Exception that is thrown when a URN is generated from in two different files in the Resource Package.
java.io.IOException
org.jdom.JDOMException

mapDependencies

private static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> mapDependencies()
                                                                                         throws ResourceMapException,
                                                                                                org.jdom.JDOMException,
                                                                                                java.io.IOException
Walks through the 'resource' elements in the imsmanifest.xml file (that were generated from the 'scoEntry' elements in the SCPM) and creates a map using the 'identifier' attribute of each 'resource' element as the key and a list of all of the 'identifierref' attributes of the 'dependency' child elements for that 'resource' element as the value. This map is then used by the processDeps method.

Returns:
Map> A Map that holds the 'identifierref' attributes of all of a SCO 'resource' elements and a List of all of 'dependency' children.
Throws:
ResourceMapException - Exception that is thrown when a URN is generated from in two different files in the Resource Package.
java.io.IOException
org.jdom.JDOMException

processDeps

private static void processDeps(java.util.Map sco_map)
                         throws ResourceMapException,
                                org.jdom.JDOMException,
                                java.io.IOException
Walks through all of the 'dependency' elements for each SCO 'resource' element in the imsmanifest.xml file and searches for referenced media (ICN) files and referenced data modules (DMC) files. The found referenced files are then added as 'dependency' elements to the specific SCO 'resource' element.

Parameters:
sco_map - Map> that holds the 'identifierref' attributes of all of a SCO 'resource' elements and a List of all of 'dependency' children.
Throws:
ResourceMapException - Exception that is thrown when a URN is generated from in two different files in the Resource Package.
org.jdom.JDOMException
java.io.IOException

searchForDmRefs

private static java.util.List<java.lang.String> searchForDmRefs(org.jdom.Document dmDoc,
                                                                org.jdom.Element sco_resource)
Searches through a data module file for referenced data modules.

Parameters:
dmDoc - JDOM Document that represents the data module being searched for dmRef instances.
sco_resource - JDOM Element that represents the current SCO 'resource' element.
Returns:
List List of all of the referenced data modules found in the specified data module.

searchForICN

private static java.util.List<java.lang.String> searchForICN(org.jdom.Document doc)
                                                      throws org.jdom.JDOMException
Searches through a data module file for referenced media (ICN) files .

Parameters:
doc - JDOM Document that represents the data module being searched for dmRef instances.
Returns:
List List of all of the referenced media (ICN) files found in the specified data module.
Throws:
org.jdom.JDOMException
